*** Settings ***
Resource          resource.txt
Suite Setup       Check Precondition   os.sep == "/" and sys.version_info >= (2,6)

*** Test Cases ***
Sending INT signal
   [Timeout]        2 seconds
   Start Process    python -c "import time; for i in range(25): time.sleep(0.1)"      shell=True
   Send Signal      SIGINT
   ${out}=          Wait For Process
